description: Amie makes her first appearance on Hogtied. Suffering through 5 punishing ties, she takes it like a professional, and bent into impossible back breaking suspensions, she takes all we give her and more. Making her cum over and over weakens her hard flexible body until she is just a plaything for our amusement; each orgasm harder and longer then the last, until she is completely exhausted.
title: Welcome Amie to Hogtied
